title: So, any ideas on what the best Ivern comp might be?
body:
My personal favorite so far:

Rengar Top
Ivern Jungle
Mordekaiser Mid
Galio Support
Miss Fortune ADC

Ivern makes laning for Mordekaiser and Rengar as easy as can be, in teamfights Galio gets a free pass to the middle of the enemy team for an Ulti which is followed up by a Rango assassinate and an MF Ulti. All the while, Morde gets to AoE wreck with E+W and ult a carry for even more damage.

Any other cool suggestions?

replies.body: Caitlyn's worth considering too - extra access to headshot via brush becomes a lot more feasible with a friendly Ivern putting brush in the right places during fights.
Is a full rework & gameplay update programmed for mordekaiser?

We'd like to do one someday, we don't currently have one underway or plans to start one soon though. There are other champions (Warwick, Galio, Urgot at the least, likely at least a couple more) that we feel need a full update more.

I am playing mordekaiser since the seaon 3, not that it count something the opinion of 1 player compared to the entire community, but here's what i think now:

After the nerfs post update, you did a very good job. I mean, the fact that everyone returned back to the thinking " mordekaiser nerfed it's useless again as before " is totally wrong and depends just on the fact they don't understand how it works. Some champions are unpopular and will be unpopular forever or till they are picked in LCS. It's not like low playrate = unworthy champion. There are some strategies like taking drake and diving bottom, or soloing baron with drake at 20 min, that if successfully work are really gamebreaking for the opponents. Maybe some rework here and there on his kit should be done since he needs rylai, but.. it's the first time i'm thinking on that: You can't add random slows to morde, because then they will build rylai again and permaslow people making it broken.. it's a bit tricky.

What i certainly know is that you should view again the IA of the drake because it's bugged and most of the times morde has to keep telling him who to attack each autoattack the drake does, making the morde itsellf impossible to play with the champion in the meanwhile.

All the other spells are pretty much good for me and should stay untouched to prevent him become useless or too overpowered. Maybe the E needs some changes because it does no damage if you build it tanky ( and he's supposed to be built ap tanky as riot said ).

For the rest.. morde will anyways remain a champion made for teamcomps and will perform relatively bad in soloq all the time, that's not important, not all champions are made for soloq. But with a great teamcomp, like IVERN ;) .. he can do really good.
